page.name: dal/tables
page.summary: Each table generates its own Table class. For example, assuming a Person table in the database, a table.PersonTable class is generated.

ul.li: Methods like createPersonRow() and createPersonRows() to create row objects
Methods like insert(conn, personRow), update(conn, personRow), and delete(conn, personRow) to perform SQL DML tasks (with transaction protection if needed)
Method like getPersonByPersonId() that retrieves a row by primary key
If the table is a child table, it allows its parent to retrieve all child tables based on the foreign-key reference.
